tool.name: COMEBin
tool.description: Binning of metagenomic contigs using COntrastive Multi-viEw representation learning

param.name: loss
param.label: Temperature in loss function
param.help: 0.07 is recommended for assemblies with an N50 > 10000

tool.help:
**IMPORTANT**
It might happen that this tool will throw out an error. If this error happen: ValueError: max() arg is an empty sequence then try to run this tool with different values it might fix this. When this error happen: UnboundLocalError: local variable 'logits' referenced before assignment then the imputed data might not be enough such that this tool will function correctly.
Also the run-time of this tool will be high since it is machining learning tool for binning!
**Input**
- The assembly file in fasta format - The corresponded bam file(s) to the assembly file
**Output**
As output from the tool is a collection of bins created with machining learning
